title: Collective Wisdom: Information Growth in Wikis and Blogs

author: Malik Magdon-Ismail, Department of Computer Science, Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute

For example, in the visibility getting up to speed, and that seems to at least make intuitive sense, because a lot of blog posts are popularized either by people who visit blogs regularly.
